bill.summary: 9/25/2002--Reported to House without amendment. PILT and Refuge Revenue Sharing Permanent Funding Act - Amends Federal law to provide permanent funding for the following programs: (1) Bureau of Land Management Payment in Lieu of Taxes (PILT); and (2) the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service's refuge revenue sharing program.
